data.title: Arizona Christian University At a Glance
data.meta_description: Discover 2024 Tuition and Admission Information of Arizona Christian University, located in Glendale, AZ.
data.text:
938 undergraduate students have awarded and the average amount of the aid awarded is $18,083.

For freshmen, 315 students (100%) have received financial aid and its average amount is $19,174.

A total of 89 faculties (instructional staffs) are working for Arizona Christian and the average faculty salary is $47,607. The studetns to faculty ratio is 15 to 1.

There are 263 non-instructional staffs and the average staff salary is $55,370.
